statements.query: MATCH (:CloudanixWorkspace{id: $WORKSPACE_ID})-[:OWNER]->(:GCPProject{id: $GCP_PROJECT_ID})-[:RESOURCE]->(:GCPInstance)-[:MEMBER_OF_GCP_VPC]->(n:GCPVpc) WHERE n.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH n LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DETACH DELETE (n) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
statements.__comment__: Remove GCP Instance-to-VPC relationships that are out of date.

statements.query: MATCH (:CloudanixWorkspace{id: $WORKSPACE_ID})-[:OWNER]->(:GCPProject{id: $GCP_PROJECT_ID})-[:RESOURCE]->(:GCPInstance)-[r:MEMBER_OF_GCP_VPC]->(:GCPVpc) WHERE r.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH r LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DELETE (r) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
statements.__comment__: Remove GCP Instance-to-VPC relationships that are out of date.

statements.query: MATCH (n:GCPVpc)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:GCPProject{id: $GCP_PROJECT_ID})<-[:OWNER]-(:CloudanixWorkspace{id: $WORKSPACE_ID}) WHERE n.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH n LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DETACH DELETE (n) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
statements.__comment__: Delete GCP VPCs that no longer exist and detach them from all previously connected nodes.

statements.query: MATCH (:GCPVpc)<-[r:RESOURCE]-(:GCPProject{id: $GCP_PROJECT_ID})<-[:OWNER]-(:CloudanixWorkspace{id: $WORKSPACE_ID}) WHERE r.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH r LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DELETE (r) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
statements.__comment__: Remove GCP VPC-to-Project relationships that are out of date.
